content.text:
# 2003 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards

| network = Multishow
| ratings =
| previous = 2002
| main = Multishow Brazilian Music Awards
| next = 2004
}}
The 2003 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2003 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2003) was held on 3 June 2003, at the Theatro Municipal in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Nelson Motta and Fernanda Torres hosted the ceremony for the fourth consecutive time.
Winners and nominees
Nominees for each award are listed below; winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
